name: BR-OKEN 1.10
description: BR-OKEN is a series of self-mades captured from an old TV screen, located in Brazil (BR) in 2012. Oken, in Czech, means windows. What we see is a mixture of antenna signals with other electromagnetic waves, known as background noise, such as the terrestrial electromagnetic field, cosmic radiation, etc, and are usually considered an error that is quickly rejected. Check out more about my works at daniomm.com.
